mlmc.estimator.Estimate¶

class mlmc.estimator.Estimate(quantity, sample_storage, moments_fn=None)[source]¶

Provides wrapper methods for moments estimation, pdf approximation, …

__init__(quantity, sample_storage, moments_fn=None)[source]¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Construct approximation of the density using given moment functions.

est_bootstrap([n_subsamples, sample_vector, …])

estimate_covariance([moments_fn])

Use collected samples to estimate covariance matrix and variance of this estimate.

estimate_diff_vars([moments_fn])

Estimate moments_fn variance from samples :param moments_fn: Moment evaluation functions :return: (diff_variance, n_samples); diff_variance - shape LxR, variances of diffs of moments_fn n_samples - shape L, num samples for individual levels.

estimate_diff_vars_regression(n_created_samples)

Estimate variances using linear regression model.

estimate_domain(quantity, sample_storage[, …])

Estimate moments domain from MLMC samples.

estimate_moments([moments_fn])

Use collected samples to estimate moments and variance of this estimate.

get_level_samples(level_id[, n_samples])

Get level samples from storage :param level_id: int, level identifier :param n_samples> int, number of samples to retrieve, if None first chunk of data is retrieved :return: level samples, shape: (M, N, 1) for level 0, (M, N, 2) otherwise
